get.summary: Get all activity registrations by customerId

X-Paging-ItemsPerPage.description: number of max items returned per page.

X-Paging-ItemCount.description: total number of items over all pages.

queryFields.name: fields
queryFields.description: Comma-separated list of all fields you want returned in the result. All other fields will be omitted.

queryUntil.name: until
queryUntil.description: Date end limit to query results.

querySort.name: sort
querySort.description: Name of field that lis tmust be sorted by prefixed by order.

queryFrom.name: from
queryFrom.description: Date start limit to query results.

queryCount.name: count
queryCount.description: max number of items to be returned (default = 10, max = 100)

queryPage.name: page
queryPage.description: page of results to be returned (default = 1)

queryDateFrom.name: dateFrom
queryDateFrom.description: date start limit to filter result

queryDateTo.name: dateTo
queryDateTo.description: date end limit to filter result

customerTilroyId.name: customerTilroyId
customerTilroyId.description: the tilroy id of the customer (either this or customerSourceId is required)

customerSourceId.name: customerSourceId
customerSourceId.description: the source id of the customer (either this or customerTilroyId is required)

findCriteriaTemplate.name: findCriteriaTemplate
findCriteriaTemplate.description: An example of a query parameter that would filter the search result

plannedTimeDescription.description: The planned time formated as HH:mm

endTimeDescription.description: The end time formated as HH:mm

startTimeDescription.description: The start time formated as HH:mm

plannedTimeDescription.description: The planned time formated as HH:mm

code.description: Code of the error, assigned by Node or the developer.

message.description: More information about the cause of the error.

Error.description: The error object returned by the service

WorkshopRegistration.description: JSON body to create a new workshop registration

ActivityRegistration.description: JSON body to create a new activity registration
